cryptocurrency head Musik lover book lover foodie

My name is Samuel Ohis Tunde from Edo state in Nigeria but currently situated in Lagos, Nigeria. I love the web that is why I like creating things that live on the internet. I create efficient web applications and websites.

I make use of modern web technologies to build web applications and websites that can run on all platforms.

I am Samuel Ohis Babatunde

My passion for coding begun when I got introduce to the internet by a family friend. Over this period of time I had many opportunities to work with various web technologies that let me gather significant amount of experience. I have been working with the internet for a year.

I am currently working as a freelance and am always open for new ideas and opportunities.
